DOC.brief_title: FFA Hypertension Inflammation Lean Obese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Recent study indicate increase level circulate fat ( free fatty acid FFAs ) increase blood pressure , impairs endothelial ( vascular ) function , increase inflammatory marker subject without diabetes . The effect FFA blood pressure vasculature fully investigate . A group 12 obese nondiabetic , normotensive subject admit Grady Clinical Research Center ( GCRC ) separate 4 occasion . Research subject receive , random order , 8-hour intravenous ( IV ) infusion Intralipid 20 % 40 mL/h ( fat solution ) , 8-hour IV infusion normal saline 40 mL/h , 8-hour IV infusion dextrose ( sugar ) 10 % 40 mL/h , 8-hour intravenous ( IV ) infusion combination Intralipid 20 % dextrose 10 % 40mL/h .
DOC.criteria: Males females Obese subject ( body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 30 kg/m^2 ) 18 65 year Blood pressure read < 140/80 mm Hg prior history hypertension History diabetes mellitus History hypertension Fasting triglyceride level > 250 mg/dL Liver disease ( ALT 2.5x > upper limit normal ) Serum creatinine ≥1.5 mg/dL Smokers , drug alcohol abuse Mental condition render subject unable understand scope possible consequence study Female subject pregnant breast feeding
